description: A massive island-ship commanded by Gecko Moria, functioning as a mobile fortress and zombie factory in the mysterious Florian Triangle.

keyEvents.title: Oars Plays with the Rudder
keyEvents.description: Oars manipulates Thriller Bark's massive rudder, causing the entire island-ship to shake and enter dangerous ocean currents.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scale of both Thriller Bark and Oars' power, showing the danger his rampage poses to the entire location.

keyEvents.title: General Zombies Defeated Across Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: All of Thriller Bark's General Zombies are instantly defeated by Oars in a single crushing attack.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the vulnerability of Thriller Bark's defense forces against overwhelming power.

statusHistory.reason: Thriller Bark operates as Gecko Moria's base throughout the arc

description: The main mansion on Thriller Bark where many of the zombie forces reside and battles take place.

keyEvents.title: Brook vs Ryuma Battle Continues
keyEvents.description: Brook and Ryuma continue their intense sword duel within the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion serves as the arena for this crucial battle.

keyEvents.title: Brook's Defeat
keyEvents.description: Brook is defeated by Ryuma's Arrow Notch Slash within the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: Location of Brook's defeat and the setup for Zoro's challenge.

keyEvents.title: Zoro and Franky Arrive
keyEvents.description: Zoro and Franky reach the mansion location where Brook was defeated by Ryuma.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the stage for Zoro's confrontation with the legendary samurai.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク礼拝堂

description: A chapel on Thriller Bark where Absalom attempts to forcibly marry an unconscious Nami, attended by General Zombies.

keyEvents.title: General Zombies Deployed
keyEvents.description: Absalom orders all the General Zombies attending the wedding ceremony to leave the chapel and stop Oars.
keyEvents.significance: The chapel's congregation is emptied to deal with the Oars threat.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Arrives
keyEvents.description: Sanji bursts into the wedding chapel to rescue Nami from the forced marriage.
keyEvents.significance: Initiates the rescue and confrontation between Sanji and Absalom.
